src_text: On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Nobel Committee for Literature at the Swedish Academy, publicly announced during a radio program on Sveriges Radio in Sweden the committee, unable to reach Bob Dylan directly about winning the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature, had abandoned its efforts to reach him.
ref_text: Pado hari Sanayan, Sara Danius, sekretaris tatap Komite Nobel untuak Sastra di Akademi Swedia, mangumuman sacarao tabuka salamo program radio di Radio Sveriges di Swedia bahasonyo komite iko, nan indak dapek menghubungkan Bob Dylan sacaro langsuang tantang mamanangan Hadiah Nobel Sastra 2016, alahmaninggaan usahonyo untuak menjangkaunyo.
hyp_text: Pado Sabtu, Sara Danius, Sekretaris Tetap Komite Nobel sastra di Akademi Swedia, manyok pado program radio di Sveriges Radio di Swedia, umumkan umuah nan dapek ka manyok Bob Dylan direk tentang manyok manangken Hadiah Nobel sastra taun 2016, tapi komite ko alah manyokkan usaha manyokkan dirinyo.

src_text: The outbreak has prompted the Indian government to undertake such measures as deployment of pig catchers in seriously affected areas, distributing thousands of mosquito curtains and spraying pesticides.

src_text: Their thermal behavior is not as steady as large caves on Earth that often maintain a fairly constant temperature, but it is consistent with these being deep holes in the ground," said Glen Cushing of the United States Geological Survey (USGS) Astrogeology Team and of Northern Arizona University located in Flagstaff, Arizona.
ref_text: "Parilaku termal ko inyo indak satabil bantuak guo guo gadang di Bumi yang acok mampatahanan suhu nan cukuik konstan, tapi iko konsisten jo fakta bahasonyo iko adolah lubang nan dalam di tanah," kecek Glen Cushing dari Tim Astrogeologi Amerika Serikat States Geological Survey (USGS) dan dari Northern Arizona University di Flagstaff, Arizona.
hyp_text: Dak sampek tingkeknyo labiah tak konstan sabagai gua gadang di Bumi nan biaso manjaku suhu nan konstan, tapi ko sado dengan tu sabagai lubang-lubang dalam tanah, kata Glen Cushing dari Tim Astrogeologi Survei Geologi Amerika Serikat (USGS) jo Tim Universitas Arizona Utara di Flagstaff, Arizona.

src_text: The Three Kingdoms was one of the bloodiest eras in Ancient China’s history thousands of people died fighting to sit in the highest seat in the grand palace at Xi’an.

hyp_text: Duo Gadang Sabuik nan sabatok di zaman dahulu Tiongkok, tujuh ribu urang alah mati dek saketan untuak manjuru tahta nan paliang tinggi di istana gadang Xi'an.

src_text: In good conditions you will be able to cover somewhat greater distances than walking – but only very seldom you will get the speeds of cross country skiing without a heavy backpack in groomed tracks.
ref_text: Dalam kondisi rancak dunsanaka akan dapek manampuah jarak nan agak labiah jauah dibandiang bajalan – tapi hanyo sangaiklah jarang dunsanak akan dapek malaju sacapek bamain ski malinteh nagari tanpa tas ransel nan barek di rute nan tarawat.
hyp_text: Dak sabau jo kamuang, ko kau mungkin aluih jauh-jauh nan labiah daripado jalan kaki, tapi hanyo saban-saban kau mungkin aluih katiok lambaga jo lalua taruih di jalanan nan alah.

src_text: If the country you will be visiting becomes subject to a travel advisory, your travel health insurance or your trip cancellation insurance may be affected.
ref_text: Jikokk nagara nan dunsanak kunjuangi manjadi subjek anjuran parusahaan trapel, asuransi kasehatan dunsanak atau asuransi pambatalan pajalanan dunsanak mungkin akan tapangaruah.
hyp_text: Jiko negara nan kini ko akan kalian kunyi, izinyo kikai jo tagi kikai tabang jo tagi batang kamanfaatan kikai.

src_text: If you only go ashore using shipboard excursions you will not need a separate visa (as of 2009).
ref_text: Jikok dunsanak pai ka darek mamakai kapa pesiar, indak paralu visa tapisah (mulai dari 2009).
hyp_text: Jiko kau indak mangko jo sabuik jo kapalo-kapalo, kau indak perlueh visa lainnyo (sakik 2009).

src_text: Rare fauna such as the European brown bear, wolf, eagle, owl, lynx, wild cat and capercaillie can be found there, along with many more common species
ref_text: Binatang langka bantuak biruang cokolaik, sarigalo, alang, buruang antu, kuciang lia dan buruang balibih bisa disobokan disinan, basamo jo jinih lain nan labiah umum
hyp_text: Sajak nan raso, yaitunyo hewan langkuak sabagai beruang Eropah, serigala, elang, ulah, linsang, kucing liar, dan capercaillie, nan dapek dipakai di situ, jo banyak spesies lain nan umum.
